message: I'm offering you $4000, which is more valuable than getting a larger amount in later rounds due to your 10% inflation penalty. This is a fair split considering the circumstances.
I'm offering you $5500 because I believe a slightly more equitable split will be fair for both of us, especially considering the inflation factor on my side. Let's conclude the deal on these terms.

Bob, due to the 20% inflation you're facing, this $3500 is worth only $2800 to you now. If you reject, your next offer will face 30% inflation, making any future gains worth even less. This is your best option at this point.
